Enhancing Medical Diagnostics

Spandan provides doctors comprehensive cardiac analysis on smartphones, enabling informed decisions and reliable patient care.

Book a Free Demo

Our Best Products For Medical Professionals

No Battery | 99.7% Accurate | Lightweight and Portable

Spandan Pro

Spandan Pro enables healthcare professionals to conduct medical-grade ECGs with just a cable, revolutionising cardiac care delivery in clinical settings and resulting in improved patient outcomes.

Our Features

  • Cloud Report Backup and Restore
  • Guest Mode
  • Auto Generated Interpretation
  • Member Profiles
  • Spandan My Clinic
  • Auto Sharable Reports
  • Digital Sharable Reports

Cloud Report Backup and Restore

Ensure the safety of your ECG reports by backing them up securely in the cloud. With the backup feature, you can restore your reports anytime, anywhere, ensuring peace of mind and accessibility.

Secure Storage

Spandan utilizes secure cloud storage to safeguard your ECG reports. This ensures information remains accessible even if you switch devices.

Anytime Access

Easily retrieve your ECG reports from anywhere with an internet connection. This allows for convenient comparison of past recordings and sharing with healthcare professionals remotely.

Guest Mode

The Guest Mode in the Spandan App allows healthcare professionals to access its functionalities without the need for creating an account or logging in. This feature streamlines the process for doctors to take patient reports without having to create separate profiles for each individual.

Quick Access

The Guest Mode can be beneficial for doctors who may want to quickly access certain features or content without the hassle of signing in, providing a seamless and convenient experience.

Independent Usage

In scenarios requiring testing of multiple patients, the guest mode enables doctors to independently access the app without the hassle of creating numerous patient profiles.

Auto Generated Interpretation

The machine-generated interpretation provided by Spandan offers quick and standardized analysis of ECG data. This feature saves time for patients by automatically interpreting ECG readings, identifying abnormalities, and generating reports.

Consistency

Automated interpretation helps ensure accuracy and consistency in results and can aid in early detection of cardiac abnormalities, facilitating prompt medical intervention.

Quick Results

Since the interpretation is generated by algorithms, it offers quick results and minimizes human error, thus improving the diagnostic capability of the device by providing accurate and efficient analysis of ECG data.

Member Profiles

Spandan’s Member Profiles feature allows doctors to create multiple profiles for different individuals using the application. This offers personalized experiences, enabling doctors to customize settings, track activity history, view past reports, and receive tailored recommendations based on their preferences.

Data Management

Member profiles streamline the organization of personal information, activities, and reports for each patient, facilitating efficient data management and segregation within the app.

Data Security

Patient profiles ensure that sensitive medical information is securely stored and accessible only to authorized healthcare providers, maintaining patient confidentiality and privacy.

Spandan MyClinic

Spandan MyClinic is an exclusive feature within the application. Here, doctors can register their clinics with the Spandan app, making them visible on the map to both patients and other healthcare providers. This enables patients to easily locate nearby clinics for checkups and consultations.

Convenient for Doctors

The feature facilitates communication between patients and clinics, allowing for easy inquiries, appointment scheduling, and access to important clinic information.

Accessibility for Patients

Patients can easily locate nearby clinics using the app's map feature, reducing the time and effort required to find suitable healthcare facilities.

Auto Share Report

This feature provides doctors with the convenience of automated report sharing with either their patients or fellow professionals. Available through a premium plan, doctors can activate this option and input the email addresses of their chosen recipients. Subsequently, whenever a test is conducted, the report will be automatically sent to the designated email addresses.

Emergency Preparedness

Helps in emergency situations by ensuring that essential medical information is readily available to healthcare providers and patients’ loved ones when needed most.

Peace of Mind

It offers reassurance to both doctors and their patients by automatically sharing relevant medical information when needed, fostering seamless communication and care.

Digitally Shareable Reports

The reports from Spandan can be effortlessly shared digitally in PDF format. This speeds up the report sharing process and eliminates the need for printing, thereby minimizing hassle.

Doctors’ Efficiency

Doctors can effortlessly distribute the reports to their patients in PDF format, offering guidance on test results and treatment plans.

Telemedicine Consultations

Following an ECG test, patients can share their reports with their doctors for further analysis, facilitating telemedicine consultations. This streamlined process enables healthcare professionals to promptly analyze the reports, leading to efficient diagnosis and treatment planning.

How to take ECG with Spandan

How to take ECG with Spandan

Download Spandan ECG App

Download Spandan ECG App from Google Play Store

Connect Spandan with your Phone

Connect the device with the help of USB cables with your Smartphone

Stick the Electrodes

Place the electrodes on the patient’s chest with the help of chest leads

Track your Health

Take test and generate report. Save and share them with ease.

Report Analysis by Experts

Get the generated reports analysed by our
experts.

Reports

The test reports can be generated with just one tap within 10 seconds using the Spandan ECG application.

Comprehensive ECG Interpretation Facility

After conducting an ECG test, healthcare professionals have the option to share the reports with Spandan experts for analysis. Our experts carefully evaluate the reports manually and provide prompt ECG solutions. In urgent or critical situations, they may also make phone calls. This interpretation service assists doctors with thorough analysis of the ECG results, facilitating timely intervention and treatment
Learn More

How Spandan Helped Dr. Ankit

Integrating Spandan into my practice has revolutionized patient care for me. Its portability, accuracy, and smartphone compatibility make it the preferred alternative to traditional 12-lead ECG machines.

With the Guest Mode, I can seamlessly conduct ECG tests for my patients without creating their profiles on the app, providing them with accurate results and personalised care. By adding my family members to my profile, I can assess their cardiac health, organise their reports, and share them as needed. Spandan promotes wellness and enhances the quality of life for both patients and loved ones.

Using Spandan in both my clinic and for my family has been a game-changer in how I approach cardiac healthcare.

Clinically Validated and regulatory compliant

User Reviews and Testimonials

Dr.Sandeep Patil
It helped to upgrade my practise, Also got expert opinion reports from sunfox promptly
Dr. Ram Krishan Saini
Nice product and very good service and support! Results are also good. Easy to use and no need for technical information to operate. All team members are well mannered and supportive. Highly recommended for day to day life and must have product for each and every home.
Dr. Suhas Joshi
I have used this ecg machine for over 100 patients. The reports are credible. Those diagnosed by the ecg as abnormal are followed up by me with 2 D echo and stress test and moostly found correct. Most of the tests done were for charity.
Dr. Dipali Solanki
Its wonderful device..i really love that device…its very helpfull….on my clinical basis it too much helpful for me…and easy to carry any where…and all sunflox group are very helpful and and its easy to understand every 1…that device demo is too good…easy to understand…i really recommended every 1…nd specially for clinics..thank u sunflox…its really greatful..
Dr Sartaj Aziz
Great and affordable ecg device everyone must have this for making their clinical practice and diagnosis more effecient. Great product, easy to use and precise result almost every single time.
